snippet.title: Moodle
snippet.description: Moodle is a Course Management System (CMS), also known as a Learning Management System (LMS) or a Virtual Learning Environment (VLE). It is a Free web application that educators can use to create effective online learning sites. https://moodle.org/

snippet.title: Weka---Machine Learning Software in Java
snippet.description: Weka is a collection of machine learning algorithms for solving real-world data mining problems. It is written in Java and runs on almost any platform. The algorithms can either be applied directly to a dataset or called from your own Java code.

snippet.title: Learning Layers
snippet.description: Scaling up Technologies for Informal Learning in SME Clusters

snippet.title: Vocabulary Learning Tool
snippet.description: jVLT (Vocabulary Learning Tool) is a tool that helps you managing your vocabulary. It allows you to create a dictionary of words and to perform quizzes.

snippet.title: Learning with Texts (LWT)
snippet.description: Learning with Texts (LWT) is a tool for Language Learning, inspired by Stephen Krashen's principles in Second Language Acquisition, Steve Kaufmann's LingQ System and ideas from Khatzumoto (AJATT). Read & listen, save & test words in context!

snippet.title: Java Machine Learning Library
snippet.description: Java Machine Learning Library is a library of machine learning algorithms and related datasets. Machine learning techniques include: clustering, classification, feature selection, regression, data pre-processing, ensemble learning, voting, ...

snippet.title: Embedded Systems Learning Kit
snippet.description: Embedde Systems: Code, Documents and Scripts
